TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlConvert extends System.Object

summary.span: 对 XML 名称进行编码和解码，并提供方法在公共语言运行时类型和 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 类型之间进行转换。

span.span: Encodes and decodes XML names, and provides methods for converting between common language runtime types and XML Schema definition language (XSD) types.

summary.span: 转换数据类型时，返回的值是独立于区域设置的。

span.span: When converting data types, the values returned are locale-independent.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在功能上等效于类，但它支持 XML 标准。The class is functionally equivalent to the class, but it supports XML standards. 类型系统基于 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构类型，并且返回的值总是与区域设置无关。The type system is based on the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema type, and the values returned are always locale-independent. ## 编码和解码Encoding and decoding 元素和属性的名称或 ID 值仅限于根据 W3C 一定范围的 XML 字符[XML 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)。Element and attribute names or ID values are limited to a range of XML characters according to the W3C [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). 如果名称包含无效字符，可以使用和中此类，以将它们转换为有效的 XML 名称的方法。When names contain invalid characters, you can use the and methods in this class to translate them into valid XML names. 例如，如果你想要使用的列标题在数据库中的"订单详细信息"，数据库将允许两个单词之间的空间。For example, if you want to use the column heading "Order Detail" in a database, the database allows the space between the two words. 但是，在 XML 中，"Order"和"详细信息"之间的空间被视为无效的 XML 字符。However, in XML, the space between "Order" and "Detail" is considered an invalid XML character. 你必须将其转换为转义的十六进制编码并将其解码更高版本。You have to convert it into an escaped hexadecimal encoding and decode it later. 你可以使用方法替换类，以确保写入的名称是有效的 XML 名称。You can use the method with the class to ensure the names being written are valid XML names. 下面的 C# 代码将名称"订单详细信息"转换为有效的 XML 名称，并写入元素`My order`。The following C# code converts the name "Order Detail" into a valid XML name and writes the element `My order`. ```csharp writer.WriteElementString(XmlConvert.EncodeName("Order Detail"),"My order"); ``` 以下方法执行编码和解码。The following methods perform encoding and decoding. |方法Method|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| ||采用一个名称并返回已编码的名称，以及由转义字符串替换任何无效字符。Takes a name and returns the encoded name along with any invalid character that is replaced by an escape string. 此方法允许中任何位置，这意味着仍名称可能是符合 W3C 的冒号[XML 1.0 建议中的命名空间](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names)。This method allows colons in any position, which means that the name may still be invalid according to the W3C [Namespaces in XML 1.0 recommendation](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names).| ||采用一个名称并返回已编码的名称。Takes a name and returns the encoded name.| ||与相同之处在于它还会编码冒号字符，从而保证，名称可以用作`LocalName`命名空间限定名称的一部分。Same as except that it also encodes the colon character, guaranteeing that the name can be used as the `LocalName` part of a namespace-qualified name.| ||反转对所有编码方法的转换。Reverses the transformation for all the encoding methods.| ## 名称验证Name validation 类包含两个方法，检查在元素或属性名中的字符和验证名称是否符合的规则集 w3c [XML 1.0 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/):The class contains two methods that check the characters in an element or attribute name and verify that the name conforms to the rules set by the W3C [XML 1.0 recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/): - 检查字符，并验证该名称有效。 checks the characters and verifies that the name is valid. 如果它是有效的并且如果它不会引发异常，该方法返回的名称。The method returns the name if it's valid, and throws an exception if it isn't. - 执行相同的验证，但可以接受非限定名称。 performs the same validation, but accepts non-qualified names. 包含验证令牌、 空白字符、 公用 Id 和其他字符串的其他方法。The contains additional methods that validate tokens, white-space characters, public IDs, and other strings. ## 数据类型转换Data type conversion 此外提供使您能够将数据从字符串转换为强类型化的数据类型的方法。 also provides methods that enable you to convert data from a string to a strongly typed data type. 例如，方法将字符串转换为其等效。For example, the method converts a string to its equivalent. 这可因为中的大多数方法类返回数据作为字符串。This is useful because most methods in the class return data as a string. 在读取数据后，它被可转换为正确的数据类型在使用前。After the data is read, it can be converted to the proper data type before being used. 重载提供补充操作通过将强类型的数据转换为字符串。The overloads provide the complementary operation by converting strongly typed data to strings. 例如，这是有用当你想要将数据添加到网页上的文本框。For example, this is useful when you want to add the data to text boxes on a webpage. 在数据转换期间，不考虑区域设置会采取。Locale settings are not taken into account during data conversion. 数据类型基于 XML 架构 (XSD) 数据类型。The data types are based on the XML Schema (XSD) data types.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string DecodeName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function DecodeName (name As String) As String

summary.span: 该方法完成 和 方法的反向操作。

span.span: This method does the reverse of the and methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对名称进行解码使用以下规则：The names are decoded using the following rules: - 从左到右解码名称。Names are decoded from left to right. - 任何序列 _x `HHHH_` (其中 HHHH 代表有效，四位十六进制 ucs-2 代码) 尚未解码将转换成相应的 Unicode 2.1 (Unicode 3.0 支持的应用程序如果) 字符。Any sequence _x `HHHH_` (where HHHH stands for a valid, four digit hexadecimal UCS-2 code) that has not been decoded is transformed into the corresponding Unicode 2.1 (Unicode 3.0 if supported by the application) character. - 不识别任何缩写。No shortforms are recognized. 将传递它们但不进行转换。They are passed on without translation. 例如，_x20\_或 __ 不解码。For example, _x20\_ or __ are not decoded. > [!NOTE] > 实际的编码的字符是特定于应用程序。The actual encoding of the character is application-specific. 例如，Order_x0020_Details 将成为订单详细信息。For example, Order_x0020_Details becomes Order Details. 在 XML 名称中无效的甚至转义的字符将识别并解码。Even escaped characters that are invalid in XML names will be recognized and decoded. ## Examples 下面的示例进行编码和解码名称。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string EncodeLocalName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeLocalName (name As String) As String

summary.span: 将名称转换为有效的 XML 本地名称。

span.span: Converts the name to a valid XML local name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于是方法，但它将编码的冒号字符，这可确保名称可以用作命名空间限定名称的本地名称部分。This method is similar to the method except that it encodes the colon character, which guarantees that the name can be used as the local name part of a namespace qualified name. 例如，如果您向此方法传递无效的名称: b，它返回 a_x003a_b，这是有效的本地名称。For example, if you passed this method the invalid name a:b, it returns a_x003a_b, which is a valid local name. 如果`name`是`null`或`String.Empty`然后获取相同的值返回。If `name` is `null` or `String.Empty` then you get the same value returned. ## Examples 下面的示例进行编码和解码名称。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string EncodeName(string name) cil managed
Public Shared Function EncodeName (name As String) As String

summary.span: 将名称转换为有效的 XML 名称。

span.span: Converts the name to a valid XML name.

returns.span: 返回名称，任何无效的字符都由转义字符串替换。

span.span: Returns the name with any invalid characters replaced by an escape string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换无效字符，例如空格或半角片假名，需要映射到不支持或不存在的架构的 XML 名称。This method translates invalid characters, such as spaces or half-width Katakana, that need to be mapped to XML names without the support or presence of schemas. 无效的字符将转换为转义数字实体编码。The invalid characters are translated into escaped numeric entity encodings. 转义字符是"_"。The escape character is "_". 任何不符合的 XML 名称字符[XML 1.0 规范 （第四个版本） 建议](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)被转义为 _xHHHH\_。Any XML name character that does not conform to the [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition) recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) is escaped as _xHHHH\_. HHHH 字符串代表最高有效位的第一个订单中的字符的四位十六进制 ucs-2 代码。The HHHH string stands for the four-digit hexadecimal UCS-2 code for the character in most significant bit first order. 例如，名称 Order Details 编码为 Order_x0020_Details。For example, the name Order Details is encoded as Order_x0020_Details. 下划线字符不需要转义，除非它后面跟有一个字符序列，并且在对名称解码时，该序列与下划线一起会被错误地解释为转义序列。The underscore character does not need to be escaped unless it is followed by a character sequence that together with the underscore can be misinterpreted as an escape sequence when decoding the name. 例如，Order_Details 不编码，而 Order_x0020_ 编码为 Order_x005f_x0020_。For example, Order_Details is not encoded, but Order_x0020_ is encoded as Order_x005f_x0020_. 不允许任何缩写。No shortforms are allowed. 例如，窗体 _x20\_ ，并且不生成 __。For example, the forms _x20\_ and __ are not generated. 此方法可保证该名称有效根据 XML 规范。This method guarantees the name is valid according to the XML specification. 它允许任何位置，这意味着仍名称可能是无效根据中的冒号[W3C Namespace 规范](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names)。It allows colons in any position, which means the name may still be invalid according to the [W3C Namespace Specification](http://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names). 若要确保它是一个有效的命名空间限定名称使用前缀和本地名称部分，并加入冒号的结果。To guarantee it is a valid namespace qualified name use for the prefix and local name parts and join the result with a colon. ## Examples 下面的示例进行编码和解码名称。The following example encodes and decodes names. [!code-cpp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CPP/convert.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/CS/convert.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.EncodeName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert.EncodeName/VB/convert.vb#1)]

summary.span: 根据 XML 规范验证该名称是否有效。

span.span: Verifies the name is valid according to the XML specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可保证该名称有效根据 XML 规范。This method guarantees that the name is valid according to the XML specification. 例如，如果你向此方法传递无效的名称中 70 +，则返回 70_x002b_，这是有效的 XML 名称。For example, if you passed this method the invalid name 70+, it returns 70_x002b_ which is a valid XML name. 如果`name`是`null`或 String.Empty，则获取相同的值返回。If `name` is `null` or String.Empty then you get the same value returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果多个七个数字指定秒的小数部分中，值将舍入。When more than seven digits are specified for fractional seconds, the value is rounded. 例如，00000004 将变成 0000000 和 00000005 将变成 0000001。For example, 00000004 becomes 0000000 and 00000005 becomes 0000001. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 XML 文件读取的字符串和使用方法将字符串转换为类型。The following example demonstrates how to read a string from an XML file and use the method to convert the string to a type. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1/CS/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1/VB/XmlConvert_ToDateTimeOffset_ex1.vb#1)] 该示例使用 transactions.xml 文件。The example uses the transactions.xml file. ```xml 123456789 1.00 USD 2007-08-03T22:05:13-07:00 ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string VerifyPublicId(string publicId) cil managed
Public Shared Function VerifyPublicId (publicId As String) As String

param.name: publicId
param.span: 包含要验证的 ID 的 。

span.span: that contains the id to validate.

summary.span: 如果字符串自变量中的所有字符都是有效的公共 ID 字符，则返回传入的字符串实例。

span.span: Returns the passed in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid public id characters.

returns.span: 如果自变量中的所有字符都是有效的公共 ID 字符，则返回传入的字符串。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string if all the characters in the argument are valid public id characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应不返回比中传递的参数的其他任何值。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 有效的公共 id 字符之间没有什么差别 XML 版本，因此不`XmlVersion`重载是必需的。The characters valid for public id do not vary between XML editions, so no `XmlVersion` overload is required. 请参阅[XML 1.0 规范 （第四个版本）](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生产 [13]`PublidChar`有关允许的字符数的详细信息See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [13] `PublidChar` for details on the allowed characters 如果参数为 null，`ArgumentNullException`将引发。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字符都不是有效的公共 id 字符，`XmlException`引发有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。If any of the characters are not valid public id characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information about the first invalid character encountered.

Public Shared Function VerifyTOKEN (token As String) As String

span.span: Verifies that the string is a valid token according to the W3C XML Schema Part2: Datatypes recommendation.

returns.span: 标记（如果它是有效的标记）。

span.span: The token, if it is a valid token.

exception.span: 该属性值不是有效的标记。

span.span: The string value is not a valid token.

summary.span: 如果字符串自变量中的所有字符都是有效的空白字符，则返回传入的字符串实例。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid whitespace characters.

returns.span: 如果字符串参数中的所有字符都是有效的空白字符，则返回传入的字符串实例；否则返回 。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string instance if all the characters in the string argument are valid whitespace characters, otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应不返回比中传递的参数的其他任何值。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 有效的空白字符 XML 版本，因此 xml 版本重载均不需之间不发生更改。The characters that are valid for whitespace do not vary between XML editions, so no xml version overload is required. 请参阅[XML 1.0 规范 （第四个版本）](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生产版 [3] 的 S 有关允许的字符数的详细信息。See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [3] S for details on the allowed characters. 如果参数为 null，`ArgumentNullException`将引发。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字符都不是有效的空白字符`XmlException`引发有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。If any of the characters are not valid whitespace characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information about the first invalid character encountered. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来分配给的开始元素的值中检测是否存在无效字符。The following example uses the method to detect the presence of an invalid character in a value assigned to the start element. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.NewVerify#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/cs/xmlconvertnewverify.cs#5)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.NewVerify#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/vb/xmlconvertnewverify.vb#5)]

summary.span: 如果字符串参数中的所有字符和代理项对字符都是有效的 XML 字符，则返回传入的字符串；否则将引发 并提供有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string if all the characters and surrogate pair characters in the string argument are valid XML characters, otherwise an is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered.

returns.span: 如果字符串参数中的所有字符和代理项对字符都是有效的 XML 字符，则返回传入的字符串；否则将引发 并提供有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。

span.span: Returns the passed-in string if all the characters and surrogate-pair characters in the string argument are valid XML characters, otherwise an is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应不返回比中传递的参数的其他任何值。No other values than the passed in argument should be returned. 请参阅[XML 1.0 规范 （第四个版本）](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985)生产 [2]`Char`有关允许的字符数的详细信息。See [XML 1.0 spec (fourth edition)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=147985) production [2] `Char` for details on the allowed characters. 如果参数为 null，`ArgumentNullException`将引发。If the parameter is null, an `ArgumentNullException` will be thrown. 如果任何字符都不是有效的 xml 字符，`XmlException`引发包含有关遇到的第一个无效字符的信息。If any of the characters are not valid xml characters, an `XmlException` is thrown with information on the first invalid character encountered. ## Examples 下面的示例使用使用检测非法字符中的开始元素的方法。The following example uses the method used to detect an illegal character in the start element. [!code-csharp[XmlConvert.NewVerify#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/cs/xmlconvertnewverify.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlConvert.NewVerify#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlconvert.newverify/vb/xmlconvertnewverify.vb#3)]
